channel.title: [HELP] global messages
channel.description:
ok i want it 2 say something every 7 seconds, sorta like the msg when u pk some1 "blah has killed balh, blah has 172pk points and 81kills"
sortal ike that in other words, i want "[NEWS] update info here"
2 be said 2 everyoen every like... 6 minutes or so ;)
any help gud rep++ if works
